wikipedia.title: Impeach the President
wikipedia.extract: "Impeach the President" is a single by funk band The Honey Drippers, released on Alaga Records in 1973 and re-released to iTunes by Tuff City Records in 2017, after being sampled hundreds of times since the mid 1980s. It is a protest song advocating the impeachment of then-President of the United States Richard Nixon. In the chorus the band chants the song's title while Roy persuades them to stop. The B-side was "Roy C's Theme".
